reviews.review:
Really recommend this game really fun on your own or playing in a team, slightly buggy now and again but really active Dev team.

only bad thing that will hopefully be changed in future updates is Lurking killers.

Overall really good game!

In this game all is based on the team,and if you have a teammate in a hook try to help your hooked friend!
Be aware The Wraith is so scary when he comes behind you and uncloacks then.
 * LITTLE UPDATE:
-This game is fun when you have good perks at lvl 2 or 3; Perks do your job easier and helps you very much in repairing generators, sabotaging hooks, traps(Last 2 with the saboteur perk) etc.
-When the game starts don't go directly to a generator and wait a bit to see where the killer is; IT COULD BE NEAR YOU!! 
-In terms of fps i run the game at 60 fps on low and as a killer i don't have more than 40 fps so if you buy the game just to be a killer make sure that you can run it with 60 fps as a killer.
 Hope you found this review helpful! Good Game!

      Yours,
                  ✯edM

这款游戏是一款很有意思的游戏，但是游戏中的很多bug真的很影响游戏体验，多个动作绑定同一个键位，比如救人和自摸，已经卡过很多次了，至今也没有修复的办法！很多人还喜欢把到20段去虐那些小萌新，我就想问，你这样有意思吗？虐一个新手，很有成就感吗！慢慢的，新手玩家-1，-1，再-1，最后排到的总是那么几个人！设计师以自己主观的来平衡这个游戏，导致了越来越多的玩家流失，这样一个游戏很难做到一个真正的平衡！很多小萌新玩这个游戏一点游戏体验都没有，什么都还没学会，就学会了拔线！很少写评论，这次用心写一篇！键盘手随意！

Well I would say you can buy the game but there are 3 problems with the game. 
first problem: Stupid matchmaking. You start with from rang 20 and the more you win you get 1 rang "down". great thing BUT not fun when you are rang 20 vs rang 1. 
Second problem. Toxic community. it doesnt take long to piss off some survivers as a killer. you just need to win a game and the end chat will just be bombed with insults(can be from bouth sides).
third problem. Some killers and survivers need to be bought with real money. i know its for licens problems but it is already super hard to unlock "normal" killers/survivers in this game.
Well thats my opinion on the game. I m still playing it and it is a fun game but can be frustrating as hell against tryhards. 
hope i could kinda help

Dead by Daylight ist schon irgendwie eine Hassliebe.
Ich habe mittlerweile über 1700 Stunden in dieses Spiel gesteckt. Meine Review wurde während dieser Zeit oft von positiv auf negativ und zurück geändert und fällt letzten Ende sehr gemischt aus. 

Das Spiel ist immer noch recht unbalanced. Als Gruppe von 4 Personen wird man oft vom Killer aus der Lobby geworfen, weil Survivor als richtiges Team die Oberhand über den Killer haben. Anders herum ist die Sterberate als solo survivor ohne Freunde unglaublich hoch, weil das Spiel über die Zeit an die Gruppen angepasst wurden musste.

Da es keine Server gibt, ist man, was die Verbindung angeht, praktisch in der Hand der Killer, welche die Lobby öffnen und somit die Survivor zum laggen bringen können. Das Matchmaking ist eigentlich ein Witz, weil jeder Noob Rang 1 werden kann und es auch überhaupt keine Belohnung dafür gibt, im Rang aufzusteigen.

Das Positive an diesem Spiel? Wenn man über ein paar ärgerliche Vorkommnisse in den Matches hinwegsehen kann, macht das Spiel tatsächllich auch viel Spaß.
Für Anfänger ist es aber leider teilweise sehr frustrierend und recht komplex, sowohl als Survivor und besonders als Killer. Hier kommt auch wieder das Matchmaking und die Art des Rangresets zur Sprache. Ich empfehle hier, einfach mit Freunden zusammen zu spielen.

should be in early access

edit: people have been accusing me of deleting my emails in order to write this review (which people have accused of not being a real review due to the sheer lack of a compelling narrative that my reviews usually have (please check out my METAL GEAR RISING REVENGEANCE review if you are interested in philosophy, economics, agriculture, calculus, etc. and greek mythologies)) so I have decided to write a complete review on the state of this game and its future effects on our children.

First of all, I'd like to thank the developers of this game for killing my dog. He was starving for days but would just not fall (similar to what the twin towers did until George Bush SMASHED that m-f'n like button on that detonation device). They sent a 9 foot cute guy with a chainsaw to collect taxes, in which I responded, "Dear sirs, I have paid the 10% sales tax on you wonderful game, yet you ask for more taxes," to which they responded with "We'll patch that out." Sadly, they patched out 4.6% of the sales tax, so I am still left to pay the 5.4% tax (which fluctuates between 5.2%-5.8% depending on my skill check). 

Now with my dead dog, I was finally able to metaphorically see that I should play "Dead by Daylight: death is not an escape" by Death by Daynight Gamers Creators (little known fact, this is actually Greek for free DLC). Now when I learned this game had free DLC, I knew that it would be a horrific experience trying to put my credit card information without the government finding out what my creidt card number was (I had to memorize it since I put duct tape over the number) when I realized that it wasn't like how Netflix was for free, but it was actually free. Excited, I had to email my best friend Spencer Pennychode. Now, that's not his real name (I don't know his real name) but you can sure bet he's got a wide chode ;). Anyways, I sent him a Yahoo email (Google leaks information to the FBI, like my credit card information and how many children are currently in my basement (I don't even know how many are there anymore, actually)) containing only two words: "two words".

Spencer was absolutely disgusted by my desire to play this game. It turns out he actually played Dad by Daycare, too, and did not enjoy it at all and said, "After 5 planets you have seen it all, just other colors and shapes. The main goal is to farm ressources, very innovative......If i want mindlesss farming i am gonna play some asia grinder" (a big thank you to Godofwar1971-- I mean, a big thank you to Spencer Pennychode for his wide weewee). 

I was in shock. Spencer was in shock. Spencer's cock was in shock. Spencer's cock was in my asshole, but save that for another time as we have to move on in this story before I am executed by Dog by Asshole's developers. To further my original point, early access is a must for this game. As a major supporter of women's rights (only the ones who agree to bounce on my dingo) and children's rights (see previous paranthesis), I believe this game needs to be pushed to early access, maybe as early as preschool. Children of today need to learn what it's like to plant wheat, go to church (part of the new free DLC), and fix up cars. This game is also a great example of being able to wear whatever you want, as the wrongfully named "Killers" are dressed in fashionable, yet unique, apparel that the regular American (or Saudi Arabian, if you're not privileged enough (daily privilege check)) would never wear on the streets. But enough about early access, I'm just here to rate the game.

3/10 match not found.

Наиграв 60+ часов,я решил что имею право написать обзорчик на этот не доведенный до ума пока что шедевр.
Спорить с тем что игра оригинальная в своей атмосфере и жанре думаю не имеет никакого смысла,так что этот вопрос даже не поднимался.
Купил,скачал,установил и наиграл 100 часов и наиграю наверное еще часов 500,потому что пекари рубят фишку и завлекли меня своей оригинальностью и атмосферой.
Кто не играл в DBD не поймет что значит,когда ты чинишь геник и в ожиданий мини-игры,не можешь почесать нос,а он ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ всегда начинает у меня чесаться именно тогда,когда начинают трогать геник.
Кто не играл в DBD не поймет что светит фонариком в ипало маньяка,также бессмысленно,как и стараться слезть с крюка.
Кто не играл в DBD не поймет,что убегаю от пилы по прямой,ты дал солгасие на анальное сношение с Хилли-Билли.
Кто не играл в DBD не поймет что убегая в топ-манс от Траппера,ты даешь согласие на анальное сношение с ним.
Кто не играл в DBD не поймет что чиня геник при звуке сердцебиение,пытаясь спрятаться ты пропустил скилл-чек,ты становишься посмертным героем-механиком,и твоя рандомная тима аутистов будут помнить твой героический поступок 5 сек.
Кто не играл в DBD не поймет всю боль предательства,когда ты целый слот перка занял перком "WELL MAKE IT",чтобы заниматься аутизмом, после того как сняв с крюка тимейта и подставившись под удор, тебя в итоге открыв двери бросает вся тима.
Кто не играл в DBD не поймет,как больно осозноние того что трап-дор к которому ты дополз оставшись последним,в надежде что у киллера нету дорогого-сталкера,кемперит маньяк вожделенно ожидая анальное сношение с тобой.
Игра пока очень багнутая и она приносит своими багами очень много боли и страданий,будем надеяться что разрабы доведут ее до ума,и когда-нибудь,в недалеком будущем выйдет патч, который исправит все баги,не завозя новые, будем оптимистами,и с надеждной и трепетом будем ждать этот волшебный патч!
Was a great game where you could have some fun , now its a paid skin simulator with even less balance than it was at the start

Это ебаное говно, игра постоянно вылетает, пишет что игрок не в сети, выкидывает из лобби. Разработчики в очередной раз жидко обосрались, никому не советую, поберегите деньги и нервы. Лучш потратить свои средства на другие хорошие и готовы игры.

ข้อดีของผู้ถูกล่า
- ตื่นเต้นมากกกกก
- เสียวสันหลังสุดๆ
- มีเพื่อนนนนร่วมทาง  รวมกันเราตาย..แยกกันเราอยู่ (เอ่อ แต่ต้องช่วยกันปั่นไฟสิครับพี่)

ข้อดีของนักล่า
- เร้าใจสุดๆ เหมาะกับคนโดดเดี่ยว อยู่อย่างหมาป่าเดียวดาย ไม่มีสังคม เก็บกด โรคจิต สันดานนน!!!!!
- ปรึกษาตัวเอง วางแผนเอง สำเร็จเอง
- เล่นให้ตายยังไงก็ไม่ตาย เชื่อเหอะ

ข้อเสียของผู้ถูกล่า
- ตายเร็วไปมั้ย (พี่มือใหม่)
- ถ้า Lag ตอนที่กำลังปั่นไฟอยู่ล่ะมึงเอ๊ยย... พี่กด space bar ไม่เคยทันเลยอ่ะ

ข้อเสียของนักล่า
- เกลียดพวกผู้ถูกล่าที่ Rank สูงๆ ตดยังไม่หายเป็นเลย เครื่องปั่นไฟเหลือเครื่องเดียวเอง!! เอาวะ ฆ่าได้คนนึงก็ยังดี
- เครื่องแต่งตัวน่ะ อย่างน้อยขอให้เท่ากับพวกผู้ถูกล่าหน่อยก็ยังดีนะครับ

This is an early access game hidden as a full released game.

-High majority of bugs which still since release have not been fixed
-They lied during their beta saying that a lot of the bugs would be fixed by release
-Rushed the game out before E3
-Lazy client side server hosting (which is actually really fucking dangerous to YOU as the host can find information of yours if he really wanted to)
-Unbalanced maps, perks, mechanics
-Matchmaking is a fucking joke
-A punishment system which favors more on the killer
-A highly toxic community (can't really blame them to be fair)
 
The game is fun but only for so long which is why I put a lot of hours into it. But 80% of that time was just annoying and rage inducing because of how when I mess up it feels like it's the game's fault rather than my own. And once you start to notice the lazy work of the developers (just released a patch, beer time!) it gets to a point where in this day and age I can not see this as acceptable

We're in 2016 and you release an unbelievably buggy game followed by no patches to fix said buggy game weeks into its release. Do yourself a favor and wait for Friday the 13th the game or Last year the game.

Oyun efsane birşey herkes alıp oynasın aşagıda birkaç tüyo verdim;

Tüyolar :
+Eger kalp atışı hızlanıyorsa bilinki katil yakınlarınızdadır.
+Bazı katiller salak olabiliyor çimenlere,çalılara saklanırsanız sizi göremeyebilir tabi bu her katil için geçerli degil.
+Eğer jeneratörü çalıştırmaya çalışırken spaceye basmayıp patlatırsanız hemen kaçın katil patlayan jeneratörü görebiliyor.
+Haritada katili yavaşlatmak için yıkabileceginiz tahtalar felan var onları katil gelirken yıkın yoksa katil dolaşırken kırabilir.
+Eğer bütün arkadaşlarınız ölüp siz kalırsanız haritada tünel gibi bir yer açılıyor yer altına giden oraya girerseniz direk kaçmış olursunuz ama her haritada rastgele spawnlandıgı için bulamayabilirsiniz yada bulsanız bile katilde ordadır.
+Katil peşinizdeyken ve yakınınızda ise dolaba saklanmayın direkt sırtına alıyor.
+Eğer iş başındayken katil sizi yakaladımı tek atıyor ve sırtına alıyor.
+Katil sizi kancaya astıysa M1e basıp kurtulmaya çalışmayın sizi alacak nesne daha hızlı geliyor ancak %10-15 şansla kaçma ihtimaliniz var bunu yaparsanız.
+Yaralanınca dolaba saklanmayın ses çıkardıgınızdan dolayı katil sizi direkt bulur.
+Jeneratörlerin hepsini çalıştırdıysanız katil kaçış kapısına gidecektir dikkatli olun orda sag-sol köşelerde saklanıp şalteri indireceginiz sırada arkanızdan vurulabilirsiniz.

Puanlamaya geçelim;
Sesler : 10/10
Grafikler : 10/10
Oynanış : 9.5/10

Захватывает

Jetzt kann ich nur sagen grandioses Spiel! 

Viele die das Spiel schlecht bewerten, haben sich von wenigen Misserfolgen abschrecken lassen. Die Leute denken immer, dass wenn man ein Spiel auf dem PC installiert man automatisch den Skill mit installiert. Dem ist aber nicht so und das zeigt DbD mal wieder. 
Das Konzept ist super und ich finde bisher auch die Umsetzung. Man muss halt erst einmal lernen wie das Spiel und das Spielen so funktioniert.
Meine ersten Partien als Überlebender dauerten zum Teil nur wenige Sekunden und auch heute nach 20 std Spielzeit kann es mit viel Pech sein, dass man direkt stirbt. Aber so ist halt das Game. Die meisten Runde laufen  nach etwas Eingewöhnungs und Übungszeit deutlich erfolgreicher. Das hängt zum Großteil an der eigenen Spielweise aber auch einwenig auch an den Mitspielern ( sowohl Team als auch Killer). Zb. hatte ich eine Runde wo nach einer Minute alle anderen tot waren. Da machste dann nicht viel.
Auch als Killer muss man das Spiel erst lernen, wie sovieles im Leben. Was von vielen kritisiert wird ist zum Beispiel, das viele Killer Campen wenn man erstmal am Haken ist. Campen bringt garnichts. Traut euch im Team oder auch alleine die Leute vom Haken zu holen. Als Killer hat man wenig Chancen wenn mehrere Überlebende zusammen arbeiten. Am Anfang campt wohl jeder Killer und wundert sich dann warum er 2 -3 Überlebende opfert und trotzdem kein Rank up bekommt. Wer campt macht meistens nicht genung Punkt. Deshalb hänge ich die Leute auf und gehe weiter auf die Jagd. Seitdem bekomme ich auch Rank ups da ich durch mehrfaches hängen, auch der gleichen Person, immer wieder Punkte bekomme. Als Killer dreht sich alles um Movement, wenn ihr gut beobachtet und antizipieren könnt, was die Überlebenden als nächstes machen, habt ihr gute Chance. Wichtig ist nicht aus der Ruhe bringen lassen. Ihr seid der Killer. Wenn Ihr verfolgt tretet die Bretter kaputt und wenn jem Katz und Maus Spiele anfängt zieht euch zurück und jagd wen anderes, sonst verschenkt ihr nur Zeit.
Als  jetzt das "Überlebe mit einem Freund" rauskam, war ich erst mal skeptisch ob das von der balance her geht. Ich habe ein paar Runden mit einem Freund gegen den Killer gespielt und muss sagen wir hatten keinen Vorteil und sind im gleichen Verhältniss entkommen wie wir überlebt haben.

Mit der Aussicht auf neu Charaktere auf beiden Seiten denke ich werde ich noch einige Zeit freude an Dead by Daylight haben.

Absolute Kaufempfehlung wenn man sich drauf einlässt und bereit ist zu lernen und am Anfang Lehrgeld zu zahlen.

Ridiculous amount of bugs, some game breaking (hillbilly addon for example). They've been slow as hell to actually fix these problems. Their game is complete peer2peer, so people can actually edit their profiles to cheat. People can also nab your IP, while not a problem to some, it is for others like streamers who need their identity protected. Better VPN up if you don't want some angry nerd rager to DDoS you.  If you're going to play this trainwreck, be prepared to experience a lot of bugs that apparently take forever to fix and a dev team that just loves to give vague responses to just about everything.

Проведя свыше 200 часов решил написать этот обзор.

Плюсы:
+ Огромный потенциал для развития игры.
+ Базовая система рангов для отражения скилла игрока. (!) На данный момент недоработана.
+ Необычный сеттинг для современной игровой индустрии.
+ Куча тонкостей и нюансов.
+ Долгий процесс вхождения в игру.
+ Большое значение имеют тайминги.
+ Уклон на тимплей.
+ Отличное звуковое сопровождение.
+ UE4.
+ Рандомная генерация событий в игре.
+ Отличный лор и стилистика игры.
+ Цена.

Минусы:
- Сыроватость многих игровых моментов.
- P2P netcode.
- Издатель Starbreeze studios, который известен своей чрезмерной жадностью (учитывая количество DLC и микротранзакции в PayDay 2).
- Маленькая команда разработчиков -> медленно развивается контент.
- Огромное количество критических багов прямиком из ЗБТ (!) теста.
- Большое число неточностей между описанием и рабочей механикой некоторых перков/предметов/подношений.

Оценка: 8/10. Определенно стоит того чтобы поиграть этим летом!

UPDATE: ЗАБЕЙТЕ НА ВСЕ ВЫШЕСКАЗАННОЕ.
ВЕРДИКТ: 0/10. ДАУНЫ В ТИМЕ ПОПАДАЮТСЯ СО 100% ШАНСОМ
很久排不上的问题终于改好了，所以回来改一下评论。新屠夫设定还是很有意思的，虽然我只玩人。人现在虽然比较弱势，但是胜在排队特别快。某种程度上来说，用户体验反而更好了。

This game is great. It's fun playing both sides, however I have a single gripe:

The survivors can just endlessly juke out the killer by vaulting over windows. There's nothing in place to balance this as of yet. I'd like to see maybe a delay on the next vault if they just vaulted over something. Like the killer hitting someone has a recharge attatched to it.

EDIT: This community is extremely whiny. I do agree with a lot of the things they're saying but the amount of toxcicity and vinegar they say these things with is disgusting. The devs won't listen to you if you're an asshole. just saying.

Ce jeu est plutôt bien dans l'ensemble! Voici les points positifs / negatis.

[h1]Points Positifs[/h1]

[list]
[*] Gameplay très amusant et bien pensé.
[*] Système d'Objets/Compétences bien fait.
[*] On peut jouer avec nos amis :)
[/list]

[h1]Points Négatifs[/h1]
[list]
[*] La recherche de partie est complètement buggé. On doit quelques fois cliquer 20 fois sur le bouton prêt pour rejoindre une partie( et je ne parle pas de lorsqu'on joue avec des amis , c'est encore pire)
[*] Les parties sont quelques fois très débalancé. ( 4 survivants rang 19-20 contre un tueur rang 1)
[*] Quelques bug gênants qui font perdre des parties sans raison. Heureusement , ça n'arrive pas si fréquemment!
[/list]

Je pense que ce jeu en vaut la peine vu son prix et si vous voulez passer du bon temps . En espérant qu'une prochaine mise-à-jour corrige les problèmes mentionnés plus haut ;)

[h1]Score final :  8/10[/h1]

プレイヤーは3人称の生存者か一人称の殺人鬼になって狭い箱庭で鬼ごっこするゲーム
基本的に殺人鬼の方が足が速いので生存者は障害物を駆使したり隠れてやり過ごしながらマップ各所の発電機を修理して脱出をはかり、殺人鬼はそれを斬り伏せ邪神への供物にする。というのがこのゲームの特徴。
現状殺人鬼を嵌めれる強ポジがあったり、ポイント消費で貰える特殊能力が強すぎるが今後の調整に期待して好評価。

Greetings Reader,

If you are planning on buying this game, first off the visuals are great and any type of windows computer even with low specs can run this game. I will warn you there are a few things killers and survivors love to do a lot. CAMPING (Killers) & WINDOW HOPPERS (Survivors). If you rage and hate being camped and never escaping death make sure you play as the killer. If you hate window hoppers more then play as the survivor. The game is great and the concept is amazing. It isn't what I expected because when I watched it on youtube it seemed that it would be even more fun. But it is addicting and I would recommend it to anyone who does not want to be scared. Personally this game does not scare me but if you are younger than 12 I would say don't play it. If you are younger than a mature age which may be young adult do not play this game because it is not appropriate for everyone. My favorite killers (Listed by order) are the: Wraith, Trapper, and Hillbilly. I also want to include I bought this game one day ago and I have played it for two hours already almost three. I love how their is no drugs, sex, language, etc. in the game. There is only gore and violence which is good for a horror game. Making a multiplayer horror game is a great idea because it really adds to the layer of mystery because you don't know what the killer's character is or who the people you are playing with happen to be. I would recommend trying to get some friends to play so that you can fix the camping problem. I rate this game 8/10 because of its concept and the multiplayer involved. I do not like 2/10 of it because of the camping but if I play as the killer it is much easier to play. Also the windows hoppers are really annoying. I usually just ignore them and go for the other survivors because while I chase the window hoppers people are getting generators!

Have fun,
-MrJasty

P.S.
This game takes many days of practice before you can master killing and surviving. I would recommend practicing surviving first. It is harder to survive because there are more buttons you have to use than the killer. Also I would recommend getting a steam controller because it is much easier to play with a controller than a keyboard.
